body: Even satan can't feel the erection

Day 13 - Manga 305* Luffy has some shitty taste. This was bad, still don't like multi story books and, just like my friend said, it was mentally draining. If this at least had a good art style, then it wouldn't be as bad.
1/10.
another long one that's just mentally draining 2/10
